name: Nursery
description: If you end your turn here, gain 1 Sanity if it’s below its starting value. Lose 1 Sanity if it’s above its starting value.

name: Spiral Staircase
description: You may spend 2 spaces of movement to move to any landing

name: Junk Room
description: When exiting, you must attempt a Might roll of 3+. If you fail, lose 1 Speed (but continue moving).

name: Chasm
description: You can attempt a Speed roll of 3+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

name: Furnace Room
description: If you end your turn here, take 1 point of physical damage

name: Tower
description: You can attempt a Might roll of 3+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

name: Crypt
description: If you end your turn here, take 1 point of mental damage.

name: Widow’s Walk
description: Add 1 to the results of Knowledge rolls here, and subtract 1 from the results of Speed rolls here (minimum 0).

name: Catacombs
description: You can attempt a Sanity roll of 6+ to cross. If you fail, you stop moving.

name: Gymnasium
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Speed.

name: Solarium
description: If you end your turn here, you may discard an item card to gain 1 Sanity.

name: Larder
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Might.

name: Cave
description: If you enter and exit this room on your turn, lose 1 die from a physical trait.

name: Graveyard
description: When exiting, you must attempt a Sanity roll of 4+. If you fail, lose 1 Knowledge (but continue moving).

name: Pentagram Chamber
description: When exiting, you must attempt a Knowledge roll of 4+. If you fail, lose 1 Sanity (but continue moving).

name: Drawing Room
description: When discovered, draw 1 card of any type.

name: Vault
description: You can attempt a Knowledge roll of 6+ to open and empty the vault.

name: Panic Room
description: When you exit, you may attempt a Speed roll of 3+. If you succeed, move to any room with a dumbwaiter.

name: Mystic Elevator
description:
Once per turn, roll 2 dice and move this room next to any open door on:
4  Any floor
3  Upper floor
2  Ground floor
1  Basement
0  Basement, then take 1 die of physical damage

name: Stairs from Basement
description: Leads to and from Foyer

name: Chapel
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Sanity.

name: Sewing Room
description: If you end your turn here, you may discard an item card to gain 1 physical trait if it’s below its starting value.

name: Locked Room
description: Put a Lock token on each door of this room. To enter or exit through a locked door, attempt a Knowledge roll of 3+ to remove the Lock.

name: Coal Chute
description: One-way slide to Basement Landing

name: Collapsed Room
description: You must attempt a Speed roll of 5+ to avoid falling. If you fail the roll, draw a basement tile and put it in play. You fall there and take 1 die of physical damage.

name: Menagerie
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, put your explorer token here and gain 1 physical trait.

name: Study
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, put your explorer token here and gain 1 mental trait.

name: Attic
description: When exiting, you must attempt a Speed roll of 3+. If you fail, lose 1 Might (but continue moving).

name: Tree House
description: Put a Plant token on any open door on the roof or upper floor. This room is adjacent to that door.

name: Arsenal
description: When you draw an item card in this room, draw 2 cards and choose 1 to keep. Discard the other.

name: Rookery
description: When discovered, search the room stack and choose a room tile to place in the house. Then shuffle that stack.

name: Laundry
description: If you end your turn here, you may discard an item card to draw an item card from the discard pile.

name: Dungeon
description: When you enter, you must attempt a Sanity roll of 3+. If you fail, lose 1 Sanity.

name: Library
description: Once per game, if you end your turn here, gain 1 Knowledge.

name: Gallery
description: You can choose to fall to the Ballroom if it’s in the house. If you do, take 1 die of physical damage.
